attributes.action: Build Heathrow's Third Runway at Robin Hood Airport, Doncaster
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ideal location for Heathrow's third runway is Doncaster.   Robin Hood 
Airport is sited close to the M1, M62, M18, A1, East Coast Mainline and East 
coast ports, It is easily accessible from 18 major towns and cities 
including Leeds, Nottingham and Sheffield. It also has one of the longest runways in Europe having been a V bomber base.
Instead of building yet more infrastructure in the golden triangle around London,  and pumping in yet more vast sums of money and jobs into an already over-heating economy, why not create a Hub airport in the heart of England? 
All the people who travel from the North to Gatwick, Heathrow and Stansted 
could be given a comprehensive alternative in South Yorkshire and revive the local economy at the same time.

rejection.details: If it was built in Donvaster it wouldn't be Heathrow's 3rd terminal. Why not simply request an airport in Doncaster?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
